title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Airline CEO says middle seat will stay. D'Souza tweet: We're always supposed to be afraid of something. Great Shutdown wipes out all jobs created since the Great Depression. CNBC's Jim Cramer: Fauci eliminates all hope. Andrew Cuomo tells Fredo: "I'm governor and you're not." NYT Rutenberg blames Rush for anti-lockdown protests. Vice President Pence calls the show, discusses horrific job losses, progress against coronavirus, protests, Governor Kemp, President Trump's commitment to reopening the economy, testing, studies that show higher infection rates, lower death rates, says crisis could be over by June. Rush's take on Trump's comments on Governor Kemp.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Caller asks a great question: Are we trying to keep people from dying or just getting sick? Coronavirus is not a death sentence. 98% recover! Fauci goes unchallenged. Heather Mac Donald on the devastating results of the shutdown. Does anyone care about the economic devastation we're wreaking? No urgency to open back up. Andrew Cuomo says "the illness is death". It's not death! 98% recover. Democrats, media want to equate the illness with death.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Antibody study shows 14% of New Yorkers have had the disease, 2.7 million, proving the death rate much lower than they told us. Millions of Americans have been infected with coronavirus and don't know it. Santa Clara, LA County, now New York. Column on how isolation does more harm than good. Media montage: Everybody wants this to end. No, they don't. Cattle broker on meat industry hardships. Could nicotine be the COVID-19 silver bullet? Ohio caller: Everyone loves DeWine, shutdown.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
